meanings.definition: Of, based on, or described in legend.
meanings.sent1: The story of the dragon was legendary in our village.
meanings.sent2: The legendary hero saved the kingdom from the evil sorcerer.
meanings.sent3: The children loved to hear the legendary tales of brave knights and magical creatures.
meanings.sent4: Her skills on the piano were so legendary, they seemed almost magical.
meanings.sent5: The legendary treasure was said to be hidden deep within the ancient castle.

meanings.definition: Remarkable enough to be famous; very well known.
meanings.sent1: The legendary singer had fans all around the world.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant is known for its legendary burgers.
meanings.sent3: His legendary appetite for pizza always amazed his friends.
meanings.sent4: The legendary mountain stood tall and proud against the blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The legendary actor's performances always left the audience in awe.
